tool_description:
Create ASCII art from your images. Create ASCII tables from your CSV data. Create ASCII figlets (text art using text fonts) for any strings using any of the 200+ figlet styles. Make our cow (or other animals) say things you want in ascii (cowsay).

All the results are returned as base64 encoded json strings to preserve the perfect formatting until it reaches your program.
name: ASCII Art
title: ASCII Art

api_list.name: figlet
api_list.description: Create a ASCII art from a given text

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: String to convert to ASCII art

optional_parameters.name: style
optional_parameters.description: Style of the figlet text you want. Pick one from the list returned from /figlet/list_styles. Otherwise a random style will be chosen.

api_list.name: list figlet styles
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ascii.p.rapidapi.com/figlet/list_styles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ascii.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: cowsay
api_list.description: Make an ASCII cow say things

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Text to put in cow's mouth

optional_parameters.name: style
optional_parameters.description: Cow style you want to use.

api_list.name: list_cowsay_styles
api_list.code:

url = "https://ascii.p.rapidapi.com/cowsay/list_styles"
